Description: Rectangular wooden coffin of Nebhotep; recessed Hieroglyphic characters; floor lost.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Published: See Davies in Davies and Schofield (eds.) Egypt, the Aegean and the Levant (1995) p.149 [pl.31.1]. Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 345
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 113, 235)
